title: Good food very slow service
text: Went for our first pub garden lunch since lockdown , food was good but service was very slow , had to wait a very long time to get our drinks ( I had to remind the two girls serving twice ) . This was maybe understandable as we were told they were short staffed but still thought 35 mins was a bit of a time to wait .

title: Yet another wonder of Athens
text: Breathtaking building built by the ancient Greeks truly another of the must see building when you visit this amazing historic city .

title: Stunning
text: Please go and soak up the history and beauty of the acropolis,so much to see you could easily spend a day seeing the structures at the top as as well as walking the slopes and seeing the other structure including the theatre of Dionysius etc . Also the view of Athens from the top is breathtaking.

title: Amazing structure
text: Truly stunning building at top of the acropolis along we the other two structure are I would say on e of the seven wonders of the modern world .

title: Do not miss
text: This truly is a must see if you visit Athens ,absolutely beautiful stadium which was truly breathtaking . It also has amazing views when you go to the top of the stadium .

title: Great Greek platter
text: Very quaint restaurant down a busy street near the acropolis . We had a lovely Greek salad followed by the Greek taster platter , which had some delicious Greek food especially the the lamb with lemon potatoes which was incredible .

title: Great museum
text: Very airy and modern museum with some amazing artefacts , and ruins underneath . It also has a really great restaurant .

title: Amazing service
text: The staff at this hotel are first rate ,literally nothing is too much trouble . When we arrived I pour room had two separate beds and when we asked if we could possibly changed rooms to one with one large bed the excellently house keeping rapidly did there magic aturned the two beds into one in no time at all . The front desk are very helpful and the free breakfast is very good with some very tasty Greek specialities as well as the normal breakfast fare .

title: Awesome
text: Definetly one of most beautiful places to visit whilst staying in arizona . Our guide wyatt could not have been more informative or helpful he , took pictures for us and told us the history not only of the canyon and how it was formed but about the Navajo nation . The canyon itself is really stunning And seems to change colour as you walk through it . You are a little bit rushed but not unduly so , you do have time to take the unenviable pictures but you canâ€™t dilly dally whilst doing so . But overall well worth a visit the canton is simply stunning .

title: Great view
text: Really great observation deck situated in the Rockefeller centre ,really good views of the big Apple

title: Very nice steakhouse
text: Very nice western themed restuarants ,which has a very good menu and great steaks the few peanuts in buckets on your table is a novel touch

title: Very large mall
text: Large indoor mall with some interesting stores and a few nice restuarants .it also have an aquarium and a a cinema

title: Bit of a hike but boy is it worth
text: There is paid car park with basic toilets .once you have parked your vechile there is short hike to one of the best views I have ever seen , truly breathtaking. Plenty of vantagepoints to take photos . The hike back on the otherhand is uphill and quite tiring I wouldn't reckon it to anyone who has difficulty walking or has a heart condition . I would say the best times to visit would be sunrise or sunset ,but I would imagine you would need to get there early as the car park gets extremely busy ,and space is limited .

title: Great day on lake powell
text: Lake powell is a beautiful tranquil place , and there is no better way to explore than to rent paddle boards and kayaks from lake powell paddle boards . They are a very friendly and knowledgeable company . I would recommend them . Next time time we will rent a lot earlier in the day so we could really enjoy lake powell and lower antelope canyon.

title: Amazing canyon
text: Amazing tour guide wyatt very knowledgable and made the tour fun and very interesting . Not only did he know the best place to take photos he also showed us ho all the amazing canyons and rocks in the area were formed . He also gave us a little insight into the history of the Navajo nations . The canyon really has to be seen to see it in all its glory . One thing I would say in October save yourself some money and just turn up for the tour there was no need to prebook . Defo a must do if you are in the area . We drove up from Scottsdale and spent the night in page .

title: Great setting
text: This restaurant is situated right near a lovely beach , food is very good and service is very friendly .

title: Great food friendly service
text: At every here a few times and found the food delicious on every occasion ,very reasonable prices and good selection from pizzas , pasta and seafood .

title: Lovely stay
text: We had a lovely stay in June at the pelican beach ,first the pros great staff who are very friendly and attentive ,rooms very clean but basic ,breakfast in restaurant on the whole is good but coffee is vile ask for cappuccino and you will then get a great coffee . Life guard on beach cannot do enough for you .now the cons pool is tiny with about eight sun beds and you are not allowed aclounger on the grass unless you are in superior rooms which loads of people were complaining about made us all feel like 2nd class citizens .also walls are really thin you can hear your neighbours .
place: The Pelican Beach Resort & Spa - Adults Only

title: Great memorial
text: Very fitting memorial to the tragic events of 9/11. I would reccomend the guided tour which is very informative .

title: Hotel in great location
text: Very modern hotel that is in a great location . Hotel is very clean and staff very friendly . The free breakfast is very nice but would be a bit boring if you stayed there any longer than a week . Room are a bit on the small size but beds are really comfy and we all had a great nights sleep . Bathroom is nice but has a frosted glass to the bedroom which if someone showers and are right up against the glass isn't the greatest for privacy . One WARNING be careful of the bell hops. We enquired how much a cab would be to JFK. The bell hop pushed us to get a car organised by him as it would be cheaper. We were quoted $75 and informed this included all tips, tolls etc. We clarified this by asking did this include the tip for driver and we were told yes. I noted that the receipt I was given said "gratuities not included". I went back again to check and he insisted that it did. His actual words were "trust me". I was totally embarrassed when I got to JFK. I handed over the money. The driver counted it and said "I guess you were not happy with the service today". I explained what I was told but could tell that he was not happy. He was very diplomatic but none the less I felt embarrassed. This kind of soured an otherwise really nice vacation in the big Apple .By the way yellow cabs offer a flat rate of around 65 dollars to JFK plus tip so if I was you that's the way I would go do not trust what the hotel bell hops tell you .
place: Hotel Riu Plaza New York Times Square

title: Great Mexican food
text: Lovely burritos and other Mexican fast style food ,very varied ingredients and very fresh tasting and you can make them as mild or hot as you like .

title: Lovely hotel in great location
text: We had a great stay in this hotel .Lovely grounds ,two good sized pools and very friendly and helpful staff .Rooms are very nice and big but could do with a bit of updating .i would reccomend when booking getting breakfast included as not only is it very good buffet breakfast the staff in the restaurant are excellent a big shout for kathann in particular. All in all would definitely come back soon .
place: DoubleTree Resort by Hilton Paradise Valley - Scottsdale

title: Great pizza in sedona
text: Great tasty healthy food ,with the combo being very good value .Very friendly servers and a great view of one of sedonas beautiful red rocks ,all in all near perfect .

title: Beautiful church
text: Beautiful church with friendly guides and a fantastic vista of sedona and the fantastic red rocks . The little fountains are lovely all in all worth a visit

title: Great bikes friendly service
text: Had a great time mountain biking in sedona thanks to bike and bean .Great bikes and the staf set up our three bikes and spent time showing us the best trail for our ability. Would go back again .

title: Birthday meal
text: Went for my fathers birthday surprise lunch ,we went here last minute (as the restaurant we had booked had kitchen problems ) and we glad we did really good atmosphere great food but the tour de force was the fantastic service from the staff they really couldn't do enough and made the meal really a great experience.The menu is really varied from French fish stew to gourmet burger and a really good bean casserole , and as this is pub a great selection of beers and lagers ,I really can't reccomend enough.

title: Great food
text: Very good service pleasant staff really good gyro I reccomend the chicken gyro but the grouper one is also very good . The owner was there when I went and is a charming old gentleman

title: Great craft beer
text: A little oasis of really good craft beer where other on the island mediocre ber is abound .Great atmosphere and great beer with very friendly staff

title: Great Holliday
text: just back from a fantastic break at the Warwick all inclusive hotel . This hotel has recently been renovated and looks it ,from the lovely decking looking out to the yachts to bright decor inside . The food and drinks are very good and of a high quality . The buffet style verenadah restaurant is great for breakfast and has a different buffet theme every evening and the two al a carte restaurants are of a great standard ,with the edge water restaurant being a particular favourite with great seafood and steaks in a lovely setting . The best thing of all though is the fantastic staff they always have a lovely welcoming smile and literally nothing is too much trouble too them ,a special shout to Debbie who made our daughters birthday special with a lovely little birthday cake made on site at very short notice Please not listen to some of the detractors on here ,I cant recommend this resort enough we will definitely come back .
place: Warwick Paradise Island Bahamas - All Inclusive

title: Great Father's Day lunch
text: Had a great Father's Day Sunday lunch probably the best roast in twickenham Very friendly atmosphere ,the chef even made up a special sauce for my vegan daughter.Good range of beers that are very well kept .Noticed they have just started doing fresh pizzas intend to return to try these out .Throughly reccomend for Sunday lunch in fact at any time as food here is excellent and the service very good and the landlady is the salt of the earth.

title: Great afternoon tea
text: Great place to relax and meet friends for tea or coffee and cake .afternoon tea is really good and the cakes delicious

title: Great takeaway
text: Have had many a great curry from the green spice ,very fresh ingredients and even a free cobra beer if you have a takeaway

title: Great value Thai in local pub
text: Very very authentic great value Thai restaurant in a typical Fullers pub (Ie great ales) .very nice beer garden and outside seating area .

title: Great food
text: Great food and well kept beer . We had the sesame king prawns which were nothing short of fantastic ,my wife had the hallumi sandwich and I had the steak one both delicious with a side of some of the best fries I have ever had nice atmosphere and warm and friendly staff There was a bit of a wait for a coffee though but overall a pleasant experience and the beer was well kept

title: Great day out
text: Went too see londons most exciting rugby team harlequins take on Grenoble in the European challenge cup .The stoop has a great family friendly atmosphere and a great selection of food outlets and a massive bar under the west stand .

title: Great pub .
text: Great public house with a great selection of real ales craft beers ,lagers and ciders . The food is also of quite a good standard and great value for money .really good place to meet on rugby days .
place: The William Webb Ellis, Twickenham JDW

title: Great view
text: Very clean hotel in a great location ,very close to many attractions like the midway aircraft carrier and the gaslamp district . Very friendly staff who can't do enough to make your stay a pleasure able one .

title: Great pizza in a brilliant location
text: Great food and craft beers in a great setting overlooking the harbour .i can reccomend the Greek salad and the vegetarian pizza was one of the freshest pizza I have ever had any where . They also have a good happy hour .

title: Great Sunday lunch
text: Fantastic Sunday roast generous portions of vegetables ,great welcoming hosts in fact I think it is the best pub Sunday roast in the borough !.

title: Thai meal
text: great locals pub with a scrummy Thai resturant . This pub offers the best of both worlds ,a really good fullers pub with great beers and a tremendous Thai restaurant which is true to the Thai cuisine.

title: Piece of history
text: Really interesting extremely well done attraction , run by volunteers who are very knowledgable. Very easy to spend the whole day on this fantastic aircraft carrier ,which houses aircraft from many decades .

title: Modern mall
text: This is a very new modern mall with varied outlets and a good food court .as it is a new ly built mall it can be hard to find how to actually get to it from the i10 .

title: Great villa
text: Spent a few nights at the desert isle on route to scottsdale from LA , and was delighted I booked into this little oasis in the desert. The villa we had was very clean and comfortable with great wifi and plenty of room . I must say the the steam room in the master bedroom was a great touch and very refreshing . The only slight minus point of the whole visit was one of the front desk wasn't very friendly and seemed to us that everything was a bit too much trouble .
place: Desert Isle of Palm Springs, a VRI resort

title: Great breakfast
text: Fabulous New York style breakfast in the desert .first class breakfast from a very varied menu with excellent service

title: Back in time
text:
Pros , v good television ,good location , v clean great staff great staff
Cons wifi worst than dial up extremely slow .very old furniture in room , fridge froze perishables. Layout of hotel feels slightly like a prison .
place: Best Western Plus Thousand Oaks Inn

title: Very varied menu
text: Very varied menu ,from steak burgers to pasta and pizza .great selection of beers as well .i would reccomend the Baja California burger.

title: Great birthday meal
text: Went to Cheesecake Factory for lunch had a very filling meal , v big portions and varied menu . The cheese cheesecakes are a must

title: Great stay in phoenix
text: Really comfortable suite very clean in fact spotless. Had many a good nights sleep in really comfy beds . Good pool area and too to it all off really good breakfasts and early evening food with with wine beer and soft drinks .Would definitely come back again .

title: Great food
text: Brilliant service from our waitress Sarah probably the best service I have ever had in a restuarant, really made our meal special .she even gave us refills to take away as it was really hot outside .brilliant.

title: Great little pub
text: Had a great time in the dean swift on a work day out ,great selection of ales and lagers and very good food

title: Great pub
text: Great beer with good selection of beers ,I can recommend the camden brewery gentlemans wit and god value burgers .

title: Relaxing break
text: We were really surprised at the high standard of this Bed and Breakfast having never stayed in one before in the US . The room ( el dorado) was like a home away from home and everything we needed was there and more. It was like they had thought of everything. The hot tub was very welcoming after a long days hiking amongst the stunning red rocks of Sedona . The bed was enormous and extremely comfortable and the walk-in shower was very large. The breakfast looked too good to eat and tasted delicious!! We were very impressed as by the time we were finished breakfast and went back to our room it had already been serviced. The biggest welcome and asset to Boots and Saddle is undoubtedly Doncy. She is extremely enthusiastic and professional whilst also caring that your stay is perfect and enjoyable. Nothing is too much trouble to her. We would definitely recommend Boots and Saddle and look forward to returning.

title: Great place to hike
text: From here there are three trails all of them are great and very different . My personal favourite is the templeton trail which gives fantastic views and even leads down to the beautiful oak creek .

title: Great day hiking
text: We spent a great day hiking around bell rock and court house butte ,this is I would say one of the best hikes in sedona in that it could be done by almost anyone .

title: Breath taking 360 degrees views
text: Although the 400 foot high climb is quite strenuous they view when you get too the top is breath taking ,giving 360 degree views of the canyon

title: Great micro beer sang great food
text: Excellent beer I recommend the seven dwarf sampler .the food is also very good we dined her twice and always had a good meal a never left hungry as the portions are on the large side .

title: Expert guides
text: This is a must see , these ancient indian ruins and pictograms are well preserved and the guides here are very knowledgable. I would definetely visit these ruins via dry creek road as not only do you get great views of boynton canyon but the trail road is not as bumpy as the alternate route the fr525 . Beware in June ,July ,August there might be a possibility that ruins will not be accessible close up please check when making your reservation as journey there would not be worth the view .

title: Very average pizzas
text: Great service by waiter ,but very average pizzas with a rather greasy cheese topping which seemed like a mix of mozzarella and cheddar

title: Great burger
text: We had a great burgers at the Mesa grill which has great views of the airfield . My wife had Gorgonzola burger and I had the 100 dollar burger with green chilli fries both of which we delicious and good value .our server was very attentive overall a very pleasurable meal .
